text: J. T. Ferguson Store, also known as the Ferguson Store or Parker Electric Co., is a historic commercial building located at Wilkesboro, Wilkes County, North Carolina. It was built in 1887, and is a two-story brick building with a distinctive pressed metal facade. The facade features a combination of classical and late Victorian details. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1982. ==References== Category:Commercial buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Victorian architecture in North Carolina Category:Neoclassical architecture in North Carolina Category:Commercial buildings completed in 1887 Category:Buildings and structures in Wilkes County, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Wilkes County, North Carolina
title: J. T. Ferguson Store
